title: Sampler, 1799
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, stem, chain, eye, four-sided, rococo, knot, satin, roumanian, and running stitches on plain weave foundation
creditline: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
description: Two alphabets at the top (missing the letter J) and three narrow pattern bands, followed by a rococo frame containing examples of various stitches, and enclosing a floral spray and the date 1799. With initials and figures of animals at the edge.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1799.
1799. Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, stem, chain, eye, four-sided, rococo, knot, satin, roumanian, and running stitches on plain weave foundation. Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection. 1975-81-1-a.
